abstract.p: Sara Stewart letter on Lisa Belkin's July 23 article on backlash against children believes she is doing society a favor by remaining childless; photo

block.p: I have never opened an issue of the magazine as eagerly as I did the one with Lisa Belkin's cover story (July 23). I'm only 27, but I have endured reactions that ranged from the quizzical to the downright vicious when I mention that I entertain the idea of remaining child free. I like to think I'd be doing society a favor by remaining childless: ecologically, I'm less of a burden (limiting my consumer consumption to myself), and economically, I'm more productive.
